name: SKYDEER Full Grain Deerskin Leather Gloves for Men and Women, Extra Soft and Hands Protection, 3D Ergonomic Design
short_description: 100% Pure Deerskin Luxury – Experience unrivaled softness with full-grain deerskin leather, naturally breathable and moldable to your hand’s shape. Unlike synthetic or cowhide gloves, our buttery-soft deerskin eliminates break-in time while offering superior abrasion resistance for long-haul comfort

Engineered for Professional Drivers – Built for truckers who demand precision grip and fatigue-free control. The natural elasticity of deerskin ensures perfect steering wheel feel without bulk, while reinforced palms withstand daily friction from gear shifts and cargo handling
All-Deerskin Construction – No cheap liners or blended materials. Every inch is premium deerskin leather, offering moisture-wicking sweat control and temperature regulation during extended drives
Pro-Grade Dexterity – Keystone thumb design + elastic wrist cuff enable seamless transitions between dashboard controls, logbooks, and tool handling. Feel every button and lever like a second skin
Size Smart – Double-shirred elastic wrist accommodates muscular forearms while staying secure. (Small fits most women; Medium-X-Large for men’s hands.)
Upgrade Your Ride: Protect your livelihood with gloves that work as hard as you do – premium deerskin engineered for highway mastery and workshop toughness.

name: Boss Men's Guard Split Cowhide Leather Palm Work Gloves
short_description: Abrasion Resistant: the work gloves feature a heavy-duty split cowhide leather palm that is extremely abrasion resistant which protects your hands from any tears, cuts, or snags while also extending the product lifespan

Durable: the safety gear boasts a reinforced leather palm, reinforced leather fingertips, and a leather knuckle strap for extra hand protection and durability in normal high wear areas to ensure a long lasting and durable product

Safety Cuff: this gloves is designed with a 2 1/2" extended rubberized safety cuff that adds extra protection to your wrist and forearm, it also helps keep you cool and comfortable and allows for quick and easy on and off access

Dexterity: the glove features a wing thumb design which adds better overall comfort and dexterity without sacrificing durability, this improves overall comfort and helps prevent fatigue for long working sessions

Applications: the BOSS Guard gloves offer great protection and durability making them ideal for jobs such as construction, farming, roofing, yard work, gardening, road work, DIY projects, and many more

【12-Pair Pack Perfect Gift】Traditional brown color for a simple, classic look with no irritating odor. These safety work gloves are suitable for construction workers, gardeners, forestry workers, carpenters, truck drivers, manual laborers, blacksmiths, ironworkers, and blue-collar professionals. You can purchase with confidence. We confidently offer you: 7×24 lifetime professional support, free return or replacement. We're always committed to satisfaction.

name: Wells Lamont 2 Pair Pack Men's Leather Work Gloves with Heavy Duty Reinforced Palms, Large (4006N-WNW) , Grey
short_description: MULTI-PACK - 2 Pairs of work gloves included
100% SPLIT COWHIDE PALM - High abrasion & puncture resistance creates a durable work glove that lasts
LEATHER FEATURES - Palm, fingertips and knuckles are covered & protected by hardy split cowhide genuine leather
CUFF - Wrist protection provided by heavy duty safety cuff
IDEAL FOR - All-Purpose, DIY Projects, Tool Use, Landscaping, Demolition, Construction, Fencing, Equipment Operation, Gardening and More!
product_description: Wells Lamont 4006N-WNW Suede Leather Palm Work Gloves provide protection and flexibility for your hands while you work. On the back of the hand, the first finger, thumb, fingertips and knuckle strap are made from economy-grade split cowhide leather, as is the palm and the underside of the fingers. This leather provides abrasion resistance where you need it most. The Gunn cut of the gloves places the seam at the natural crease of your hand, below the two middle fingers, for a comfortable fit, while the winged thumb gives you extra flexibility. The elasticized wrist helps the gloves stay in place, while also keeping dirt and debris out. These Wells Lamont Suede Leather Palm Work Gloves come with a heavy-duty safety cuff to protect your wrist. These gloves come in a 2 pair pack. Wells Lamont – Stubborn about Quality since 1907.

name: 12 Pairs Heavy Duty Durable Cowhide Leather Work Gloves for Construction, Industrial and Personal Use
short_description: DURABILITY AND ABRASION RESISTANCE: These work gloves are made from natural soft leather, which is resistant to wear and tear, ensuring that they will last for a long time even with frequent use. This makes them ideal for demanding tasks that require gloves to withstand abrasion, such as wet work, carpentry, and construction.

VERSATILITY: These gloves for men are suitable for a wide range of applications, including wet work, carpentry, construction, driving, equipment operation, farming, landscaping, tractor trailer operation, and fork lift operation. Their general-purpose design means they can be used in a variety of tasks and environments, both indoor and outdoor. They are also well-suited for use in a warehouse setting.

KEYSTONE THUMB: The keystone thumb design of these work gloves allows for a greater range of motion and flexibility in the thumb, making it easier to grasp and manipulate objects. This can be especially useful in tasks that require precise hand movements, such as driving or equipment operation.

SIZE AND QUANTITY OPTIONS: These gloves are available in seven different sizes: Small, Medium, Large, X-Large, 2X-Large, 3X-Large, and 4X-Large. This ensures that they can fit a wide range of hand sizes and shapes, providing a comfortable and secure fit for all users. In addition to individual sizes, these gloves are also available in bulk quantities of 12, 24, 36, and 120 pairs, making it easy to stock up on the right size and number of gloves for your needs.

HIGH-QUALITY COWHIDE LEATHER: These work gloves are made from natural soft cowhide leather, which is known for its softness and durability. This makes them comfortable to wear for long periods of time and provides excellent grip and dexterity, allowing users to easily handle objects with precision.
product_description: Our natural soft leather driver glove provides excellent durability and abrasion resistance. Great for wet work, carpentry, construction, driving, equipment operation, farming, landscaping, tractor trailer operators, and fork lift operations. This general-purpose glove is perfect for indoor and outdoor use.

name: MAGID DuraMaster TB725E Gunn-Cut Leather Palm Glove with Safety Cuff, 12 Pairs
short_description: Cowskin Split Leather Palm: Durable leather palm is abrasion resistant and provides superior grip in any environment; Ideal for tough, rugged jobs.
Canvas Safety Cuff: 2-1/2” canvas safety cuff easily goes over sleeves to protect the wrist area; Durable design protects against heat and abrasion.
Comfortable Fit: Easy fitting gunn-cut pattern features seams between the fingers and on the back of the hand, not across the palm.
Leather Tips and Knuckle Strap: Leather reinforcement on the fingers and knuckles add durability at high stress points; High-quality leather material.
Elastic Wrist: Stretchable elastic wrist ensures a comfortable fit; Size large gloves adjust to fit a range of wearers.
product_description: MAGID's DuraMaster® TB725E work gloves are designed for every job. The gloves boast a split leather palm that’s best suited for tough, rugged jobs. With built-in padding and extra protection where you need it the most, DuraMaster® TB725E leather work gloves go from job to job with ease. The large leather gloves are sold in 12-pair packages and the best-selling style is perfect for businesses, construction crews and more. The gloves feature several protection and durability-enhancing features, such as full split leather index fingers, leather tips and a leather knuckle strap. The TB725E general purpose gloves don't skimp on comfort either, featuring a rubberized wrist, gunn-cut pattern, and a canvas safety cuff. Elastic cuffs keep the gloves in place and offer a secure, comfortable fit. These features, combined with the low prices you expect from MAGID, make the DuraMaster® TB725E rugged gloves a comfortable, durable and affordable choice for general purpose hand protection. Order a 12-pack of gloves today and get to work.
